mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, CREATED_TS, LAST_UPDATED_TS FROM USER_GROUP WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT ID, NAME, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, CREATED_TS, LAST_UPDATED_TS FROM USER_GROUP WHERE NAME = #{name}

SELECT UG.ID, UG.NAME, UG.CREATED_BY, UG.LAST_UPDATED_BY, UG.CREATED_TS, UG.LAST_UPDATED_TS FROM USER_GROUP UG INNER JOIN USER_GROUP_PERMISSIONS UGP ON UG.ID = UGP.USER_GROUP_ID INNER JOIN SAFE_DEPOSIT_BOX SDB ON UGP.SDBOX_ID = SDB.ID WHERE SDB.ID = #{safeDepositBoxId} AND UGP.ROLE_ID = #{roleId}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT UG.ID) FROM USER_GROUP UG INNER JOIN USER_GROUP_PERMISSIONS UGP ON UG.ID = UGP.USER_GROUP_ID INNER JOIN SAFE_DEPOSIT_BOX SDB ON UGP.SDBOX_ID = SDB.ID WHERE UGP.ROLE_ID = #{roleId}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT UG.ID) FROM USER_GROUP UG INNER JOIN USER_GROUP_PERMISSIONS UGP ON UG.ID = UGP.USER_GROUP_ID INNER JOIN SAFE_DEPOSIT_BOX SDB ON UGP.SDBOX_ID = SDB.ID WHERE UGP.ROLE_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM ROLE WHERE NOT (NAME = 'owner'))
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT UG.ID) FROM USER_GROUP UG INNER JOIN USER_GROUP_PERMISSIONS UGP ON UG.ID = UGP.USER_GROUP_ID INNER JOIN SAFE_DEPOSIT_BOX SDB ON UGP.SDBOX_ID = SDB.ID
